articles.description: After edging No. 3 Purdue earlier in the week, No. 14 Ohio State cruises to an 82-64 win against Iowa.
articles.headline: Ohio State rolls against Iowa

images.caption: After edging No. 3 Purdue earlier in the week, No. 14 Ohio State cruises to an 82-64 win against Iowa.
images.name: Ohio State rolls against Iowa

articles.description: Keita Bates-Diop had 14 points and eight rebounds, and No. 14 Ohio State beat Iowa 82-64 on Saturday for sole possession of first place in the Big Ten.
articles.headline: No. 14 Ohio State drops Iowa 82-64, takes Big Ten lead

images.caption: After edging No. 3 Purdue earlier in the week, No. 14 Ohio State cruises to an 82-64 win against Iowa.
images.name: Ohio State rolls against Iowa

articles.description: Crimson Tide head coach Avery Johnson joins SEC Now to reflect on Bama's huge win over No. 15 Tennessee.
articles.headline: Johnson expects Tide to reach another level

articles.description: Donte Wright scored 17 points, Patrell Rogers scored 16 and South Carolina State held on to beat North Carolina A&T 90-85 on Saturday.
articles.headline: South Carolina State fends off late North Carolina A&T rally

articles.description: Donta Hall had 17 points and 11 rebounds and Collin Sexton scored 16 points to lead Alabama to a 78-50 victory over No. 15 Tennessee on Saturday night.
articles.headline: Alabama races to 78-50 win over streaking No. 15 Tennessee

images.caption: Crimson Tide head coach Avery Johnson joins SEC Now to reflect on Bama's huge win over No. 15 Tennessee.

articles.description: Chris Clemons knocked down five 3-pointers and scored 25 points as Campbell took over sole possession of third place in the Big South Conference by cruising past Longwood, 88-54 on Saturday.
articles.headline: Campbell alone in 3rd in Big South, beats Longwood 88-54
